title: Nickel: The metal driving the EV revolution
description: Further advances in nickel-containing battery technology means its increasing role in energy storage systems like secondary or reusable batteries like nickel cadmium, nickel metal hydrate and Li-ion batteries. It is fast becoming an essential component of most secondary battery designs, including lithium.
